    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws ViewInitializationException
      Description copied from interface: ViewAPI
      Initializes the view as a splash screen with the specified parameters. Should be called before any rendering operations.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface ViewAPI
      Overrides:
